name: Proximon Controls Private Limited
tag_list: inductive-proximity-sensors, capacitive-proximity-sensors, photo-electric-proximity-sensors, switch-mode-power-supplies, power-supplies, counters, encoders, colour-mark-sensors, print-mark-sensors, proximity-switches, digital-controllers, automation-senso
overview:
Proximon Controls Pvt. Ltd., an established name today in the automation products industry, has a legacy of 16 long years of quality output. It started with manufacturing of Inductive Proximity Sensors, Capacitive Proximity Sensors, Photoelectric Sensors & Color Mark sensors. Subsequently, Logic Controllers for Packaging Machines were added in the product range.

The companyâ€™s philosophy has always been to make available High Quality Automation Products to the Indian Users at reasonable prices. As an extension of this endeavour, Proximon brought Precision Encoders & Counting Systems of Hengstler, Germany to the Indian market in the year 2000.

The long felt need of Indian OEMS, of an Indigenous Reliable SMPS at attractive prices was fulfilled by the company with its Marathon series SMPS. Today, it is the only company that manufactures Indigenous SMPS with CE compliance.

All these products are manufactured at the companyâ€™s state-of-the-art modern manufacturing facility at Navi Mumbai. A fully equipped design & engineering facility caters to customized solutions for OEMS. Our Product Range

* Inductive-Capacitive Sensors
* Photo Electric Sensors
* Power Supplies
* Logic Controllers
* Encoders
* Counters and Indicators
